text:
Report #6
12-12-54
TO:
FROM:
RE:
NAEB BOARD OF DIRECTORS
Frank E* Schooley
NAEB Radio Network„
There have been numerous discussions of name for NAEB Radio
Network-, This has been topic for regional meetings, for
some of our Board discussions* We’ve used various forms on
our taped programs*
In order to give direction and, I hope, solve the dilen&ia
that poor John Holt has been in so often, I’ve instructed him
to use: NAEB Radio Network*
I hope you’ll all approve * Violent objectors only ones
needing to file with me* Otherwise, we’re proceeding, in
spirit of membership wishes and in line with keeping NAEB
identification as well as use a type used by most all radio*
